archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Convert Report To Service Performance Degradation Report Format
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description If the service performance degradation report is created as a result of a notification or request from processes other than Monitor Service Performance processes, this process responsible for converting the received information into a form suitable for the Service Performance Management processes, and for requesting additional information if required. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Applies where the service performance degradation report is created as a result of a notification or request from processes other than Monitor Service Performance processes, Mandatory This process is responsible for converting the received information into a form suitable for the Service Performance Management processes, and for requesting additional information if required.
